About

I'm a full-stack developer (mostly frontend) passionate about working with React.
When I build websites I use Next.js with my SEO experience and when I build web-apps I use React with Bulma/Tailwind or React admin. I also use Python for various business solutions.

What do I bring to the table?
I've got 3+ years of programming experience ready to put to use. My background in Marketing, SEO, Graphic design and Photography allows me to combine it all together with Web technology, making me a valuable asset for my team.

I don't want...
...Just another job. I want to solve real problems and make people's lives easier in a community that shares my passion for technology.
